scripts.build-css: node-sass-chokidar --include-path node_modules/ --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/styles/index.scss -o src/
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar --include-path node_modules/ --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/styles/ -o src/ --watch --recursive
